Richard, I cannot see it in Mozilla, but can in IE7, I think it is a 
cooki=
e blocker thing, try turning off cookie blocking maybe ?.

I concur with Pe=
ter, this looks like it has seen many better days. The 
partina seems gone =
for the most part.  I wonder if someone has had a go 
at cleaning it ?. The=
 seppa dai is almost bare metal, while around the 
tree on the right, there=
 is active rust in the tight corners. I wonder 
if that tree and the branch=
es above were once covered in Shakudo ?.

This could also be a Aizu Shoami =
piece though I have not researched the 
mei. The first two kanji on the rig=
ht look to read Tei=C3=B4 but the third 
has me beat.

Cheers

Rich
